document.full_text: the miami heat has seemingly rebounded after hitting rock bottom with a win over the lakers on thursday, but a closer look at miami's recent performance shows that its five-game losing streak wasn't so disastrous after all.
document.title: miami won, but nothing has changed
lines_and_colors: the miami heat has seemingly rebounded after hitting rock bottom with a win over the lakers on thursday, but a closer look at miami's recent performance shows that its five-game losing streak wasn't so disastrous after all.
